entry.question: If the upgraded character is attacking an Autobot Leader, does it also get +1 attack from the first ability?
entry.answer: Yes. Both abilities apply and the upgraded character gets +1 attack and Pierce 3.

entry.question: If one of my characters has a Weapon or Utility in its Armor slot (e.g. Energon Mace), can I play Ghost Shield to upgrade that character?
entry.answer: No. In order to play Ghost Shield, it must replace an Armor in that slot.

entry.question: Can I put this on Decepticons?
entry.answer: Yes, just because it is an Autobot card doesn’t mean that restricts who you can play it on. Take Energon Mace as an inverse example.

In bot mode, Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening gains the benefits of his faction Upgrade ability as long as the faction Upgrades on him aren’t Autobot or Quintesson. As of this (FAQ's) writing, these are all the faction Upgrades that Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening can utilize to buff your team. Autobot:
Any Autobot Upgrade, though Noble’s Blaster also has a [G] pip
Decepticon:
Electro-Optical Visor
Energon Mace
Fusion Cannon of Megatron
Hazardous Shield
Null-Ray of Starscream
Mercenary:
Black Mail (Wave BFA)
Dutch (Wave BFA)
Subcontractor Agreement (Wave BFA)
Valuable Contract
Quintesson:
Any valid Quintesson Upgrade
